scenes.action_text: BLACK We HEAR "Waltzing Matilde," by Tom Waits. INT. MUSEUM OF MODERN ART - DAY (DREAM SEQUENCE IN GRAINY BLACK AND WHITE) Fade out music. Silence. A well-dressed black BOY and his MOTHER walk through several galleries. They stand before Picasso's "Guernica," holding hands. The mother is disturbed. Crying.
